episodes.title: The Cult Next Door - The Zion Society: Abuse, Raid, & Takedown
episodes.description: In this episode, we delve into the chilling story of the Zion Society, a secretive cult that operated in North Ogden, Utah during the 1980s and early 90s. Led by Arvin Shreeve, the group manipulated vulnerable individuals into a twisted world of abuse, control, and deception. Join us as we uncover the disturbing details of this forgotten chapter in Utah's history, from the cult's rise to its dramatic fall, and explore how survivors found the strength to break free and seek justice. Profiling Evil Podcast: - https://www.youtube.com/@ProfilingEvil Reddit - Our Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/FivesACrowd - Our Account: https://www.reddit.com/user/FivesACrowdPodcast Follow Our Personal Accounts Austin - https://allmylinks.com/austinspomer Cam - https://www.instagram.com/effinburch/ Chris - https://www.instagram.com/thechrishummel/ Tony - https://www.instagram.com/theonlytonyc/ Zach - https://www.instagram.com/zvanbeekum/ Hashtags #JoinTheCrowd #HitTheBell #Podcast P.O.
